performed-functions: Software Engeneer & DevOps • Climber • Hobbyist musician
about-me-content-1: I'm an aspiring software engineer and devops, currently finishing my master's degree in Information and Communication Technology at AGH UST. I've been programming for 8 years, working on many personal projects. I am currently actively involved in the SAKWA Mountaineering Club
about-me-content-2: After work, I highly value staying active, especially through sport climbing. In the evenings, I enjoy playing guitar and singing.
project-1-content: DIY robotic arm, based on Arduino, controllable in real time via dedicated .NET app
project-2-content: A mobile application that automatically scans the Scrabble board and displays the highest-scoring words.
project-3-content: Detailed 3D topographic map of the Tatra Mountains with avalanche (slope), topographic and orthophotomap layers
project-4-content: My adventure with one of boulder problems on Cube Baldy&Kawa in Kraków
sports-content: I value so much any kind of sports and love to try new ones. But first of all, I train in rock climbing and bouldering for a long time. I'm also a judge of sports climbing in Polish Mountaineering Association. Recently I started much more roller skating, especially as an urban ride. During my vacation time, I like to go on a multi-day bike trip.
